name: Zscaler
description: This app implements containment and investigative actions on Zscaler

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will add the IP(s) as a rule to that category. If it is left blank, it will instead add the IP(s) to the global blacklist.

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs

actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will add the URL(s) as a rule to that category. If it is left blank, it will instead add the URL(s) to the global blacklist.

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs

actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will remove the IP(s) from that category. If it is left blank, it will instead remove the IP(s) from the global blacklist.

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will remove the URL(s) from that category. If it is left blank, it will instead remove the URL(s) from the global blacklist.

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs

actions.description: Add an IP address to the whitelist
actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will add the IP(s) as a rule to that category. If it is left blank, it will instead add this IP(s) to the global blacklist.

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

actions.description: Add a URL to the whitelist
actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will add the URL(s) as a rule to that category. If it is left blank, it will instead add the URL(s) to the global blacklist.

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs

actions.description: Remove an IP address from the whitelist
actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will remove the IP(s) from that category. If it is left blank, it will instead remove the IP(s) from the global blacklist.

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

actions.description: Remove a URL from the whitelist
actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will remove the URL(s) from that category. If it is left blank, it will instead remove the URL(s) from the global blacklist.

url.description: A comma seperated list of URLs
